headline: Is Coinbase Global (COIN) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Recent Share Swings
summary: If you are wondering whether Coinbase Global's current share price matches what the business might be worth, you are asking the right question before making any long term decisions. The stock recently closed at US$245.59, with returns of 8.6% over the last 7 days, an 11.5% decline over 30 days, a 3.8% gain year to date, and a 5.5% decline over the last year, while the 3 year return is very large. Recent headlines around Coinbase Global have focused on its role as a major listed crypto...

headline: Coinbase Global (COIN) Is Up 8.6% After Wall Street Upgrades On ‘Everything Exchange’ Pivot - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent days, Coinbase Global has attracted renewed attention after multiple major Wall Street firms upgraded the company to Buy, citing its expanded focus on crypto infrastructure and multi-asset trading, including U.S. equities, derivatives, tokenization, and prediction markets. Analysts argue that Coinbase’s push to become an “everything exchange,” combined with a growing share of revenue from subscription and services, could meaningfully reshape how investors view the durability and...

headline: Bitcoin heads positive week after unemployment rate falls: CNBC Crypto World
summary: On today's episode of CNBC Crypto World, bitcoin ends the week above $91,000. Plus, Bank of America upgrades Coinbase to a buy rating from neutral, while leaving its $340 price target unchanged. And, Roger Bayston, head of digital assets at Franklin Templeton, discusses the investment firm's partnership with Wyoming on the state's stable token.

headline: Andreessen Horowitz raises $15 billion, as VC firm goes big in infrastructure, defense
summary: Ben Horowitz, the firms co-founder, said the latest fundraising is equal to 18% of all venture capital dollars allocated in the U.S. in 2025.
